item.description:
Umesh is coming to the U.S. again and we are so blessed to have him here at the Center!!!

He will spend quality time at the Holistic Self Center sharing key ways to bring yourself into your natural self.

 

Do you wnat to know...?

How to stay calm, centered and peaceful amidst the noise, chaos and confusion of modern day living?

Who you really are, and why you are on this earth?

How to live with passion, joy and love?

Umesh will present a free program for all HSCC and meetup particapants and any guest.

This is a Non-Religious and Universal Workshop and will gi e you a sample of the upcoming programs he will be presenting at the Center. All programs are tested and proven programming with 100% Money Back Guarantee.

Awaken~The Divine You®

Additional Programs

Foundation Level April 9-10, 2011

Advanced Level April 15-16, 2011

Personal Mastery April 17-18, 2011

Private Consultations April 12 & 14, 2011

For more information see addional programs on meetup, visit www.addestracenter.com or email

chinsim@addestracenter.com
item.how_to_find_us: Join us at the HSCC at 12 Murphy Dr in Nashua
item.why: Umesh is an International Speaker from Singapore that shares how to go to your own greatest depth for your highest levels of personal power. This is life changing teachings.

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction
